name: Disappearing Hallway

exits.description: Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
You have reached the combining room.
Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
To the West, the Ant Hill dominates the surrounding scenery.
Even when your sight fails you, your sense of touch tells you there's a wall in this direction.
Now you see the ceiling.  Now you see the sky
Now you see the hard wood floor.  Now you see dirt.

description: You are in an East-West hallway, or surrounded on all sides by tall grass.  The walls around seem to be constantly flickering in and out of existence -- sometimes opaque white, sometimes transparent.
